name: Saratorus - Between Light and Shadow
description: This is the sequel to Bahamut, as the subtitle suggests. Decades after the events on the island, Lyla lives a quiet life as an elderly woman in a new land. But her past is coming back to haunt her and now she must set out to regain her strength and save the land she built from certain doom. Help Lyla face this adventure and go on an epic quest. Featuring more dungeons, more items and a reworked battle system, this game will take you on a ride. Are you good enough to help Lyla overcome this darkness?
